H0.text: What name is given to the change of state from liquid to gas. Evaporate

H1.text: What name is given to the change of state from liquid to gas. Gasify

H2.text: What name is given to the change of state from liquid to gas. Volatilize

H3.text: What name is given to the change of state from liquid to gas. Vaporise

A4.text: Vaporization (vapourisation in British English) of an element or compound is a phase transition from the liquid phase to vapor.

A5.text: Evaporation is a phase transition from the liquid phase to vapor (a state of substance below critical temperature) that occurs at temperatures below the boiling temperature at a given pressure.
